parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: IsAll
parameters.description: Specifies whether to obtain the information about all Kubernetes clusters. If you set the value to false, only the information about unassociated clusters is obtained.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).
